name: df-smu
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(csmu, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cn0), cpw(cn0), crab(s2, cn0, wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cseq(nat0, cmpo(s3, s4, cpw(cn0), cn0, co(cv(s3), csad, crab(s5, cn0, wa(wcel(cv(s4), cv(s0)), wcel(co(cv(s5), cmin, cv(s4)), cv(s1)))))), cmpt(s5, cn0, cif(emptycls, co(cv(s5), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s5), nat0)))), co(cv(s2), caddc, nat1))))))
comment: Define the multiplication of two bit sequences, using repeated sequence addition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2016.)
